songs.title: Voices
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Shakewell]
MTM, hit 'em with the heat

[Verse 1: Pouya]
I'm a young man, I don't romance, no slow dance
My emotions bottled up to never be let out
Floating deep in the ocean
You got me feeling like I wasn't dead inside
With the way you jumping outta that two-piece
Groupies think it's a movie, but no, they cannot move me
I never had a role model, my best friends turn into my rivals
Pistol gripping, never slipping
Got it on me, ducking from the 50
You yelling in the void of voices
No one hears you crying dying talking to yourself
What else do you need?
You feel incomplete, got nothing else in your reach

[Chorus: Pouya]
Out with the old, in with the brand new, I still feel nauseous today
Every time I try to break out, I get weighed down
Maybe no more hiding today
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
Out with the old, in with the brand new, I still feel nauseous today
Every time I try to break out, I get weighed down
Maybe no more hiding today
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did

[Verse 2: Pouya]
My momma warned me said da money gon' change your friends
You gon' take handshakes from fake fucks that won't get near your grave when you die, no surprise
Euthanize, you and I
You were the one that said I was the one
But when the time come, you were nowhere to find
Now everybody wanna be around me
I got the formula for the come up
Everybody get the fuck from 'round me
Where was you when I was on the ground?
I'm raid to you roaches so when you approaching be certain to show me respect
The Underground Underdog only get stronger the deeper I get

[Chorus: Pouya]
Out with the old, in with the brand new, I still feel nauseous today
Every time I try to break out, I get weighed down
Maybe no more hiding today
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
Out with the old, in with the brand new, I still feel nauseous today
Every time I try to break out, I get weighed down
Maybe no more hiding today
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
And I still feel the same now and I still feel the same as I did
